meanings.definition: To talk with excessive pride or self-satisfaction about one's achievements, possessions, or abilities.
meanings.sent1: He boasts about his new car all the time.
meanings.sent2: She often boasts about her cooking skills.
meanings.sent3: The cat boasts about catching a mouse, but it was just a toy.
meanings.sent4: The tree boasts its colorful leaves in the autumn.
meanings.sent5: The peacock boasts its vibrant feathers to attract a mate.

meanings.definition: A statement in which one boasts.
meanings.sent1: His boast about winning the race was met with skepticism.
meanings.sent2: She made a boast about her upcoming promotion.
meanings.sent3: The boast of being the best singer in the school was quickly disproved.
meanings.sent4: His boast of being a superhero was just a playful exaggeration.
meanings.sent5: The boast of owning a spaceship seemed far-fetched.
